name: github_create_issue
description: Create a new issue on a GitHub repository. You must be logged into GitHub and have permission to create issues.

steps.code: const resp = await fetch('https://api.github.com/repos/{{repo}}/issues', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/vnd.github.v3+json' }, credentials: 'same-origin', body: JSON.stringify({ title: `{{title}}`, body: `{{body}}` }) }); if (!resp.ok) { const err = await resp.text(); throw new Error('Create issue failed: ' + resp.status + ' ' + err); } const issue = await resp.json(); return { success: true, number: issue.number, title: issue.title, url: issue.html_url }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Create issue via GitHub API
